recommended_degree: Administrasi Logistik, Logistik, Logistik Bisnis, Manajemen Logistik, Teknik Logistik (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Assisting in goods receiving, storage, and dispatch documentation.
Supporting stock counting and inventory record updates.
Helping to prepare delivery orders and inventory reports.
Observing warehouse layout and goods arrangement.
Supporting improvement of warehouse efficiency and 5S.
